analysis.key_quote: After the Supreme incompetence shown by trump's appointees, enacting this rule will only lead to the further destruction of, and faith in, our government.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the negative impact of politicization on government integrity, particularly referencing the incompetence of political appointees. This aligns with a broader theme of opposing the politicization of civil service.
